title: SET_HEALTH_CONFIG_INJURED_THRESHOLD

0xF9D9B647// SetHealthConfigInjuredThreshold
void SET_HEALTH_CONFIG_INJURED_THRESHOLD(char* configName, float newValue);Parameters:configName: Name of health config.newValue: ValueSets default injured health threshold value for specific health config.
